plot: Charles is a prominent businessman with everything a person can desire. Yet, he longs for a simpler time and a very meaningful lost childhood possession. One day, he sees it again, and will do anything to get it back in his life.
title: Banana Seat
plot_es: Charles is a prominent businessman with everything a person can desire. Yet, he longs for a simpler time and a very meaningful lost childhood possession. One day, he sees it again, and will do anything to get it back in his life.
plot_en: Charles is a prominent businessman with everything a person can desire. Yet, he longs for a simpler time and a very meaningful lost childhood possession. One day, he sees it again, and will do anything to get it back in his life.
